Question: MEDiThings Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MEDiThings Co., Ltd.

MEDiLight

- Wearable device using near-infrared technologies
- Alerts user when it's time to urinate via phone alerts
- Designed for people with spinal cord injuries or neurological conditions

Squad Mobility

Solar City car

- Solar-powered electric vehicle
- 6.6-foot-long with 250-watts-peak rooftop panel
- Prototype showcased at CES, priced at $6,250

OrCam Technologies

OrCam Hear

- Targets the "cocktail party problem" for people with hearing loss
- System of ear buds and A.I.-powered app
- Creates speaker profiles to isolate voices in noisy spaces

EcoFlow

Delta Pro Ultra

- Solar-powered backup battery generator
- Portable at 186 pounds
- Can program to take over during peak energy times

Withings

BeamO

- Four-in-one device combining thermometer, electrocardiogram, digital stethoscope, and blood oxygen monitor
- Potential for telehealth visits
- Pending FDA review, priced at $249.95
Summary_cn:
MEDiThings Co., Ltd.

MEDiLight

- 使用近红外技术的可穿戴设备
- 通过手机提醒用户上厕所的时间
- 设计用于脊髓损伤或神经系统疾病的人群

Squad Mobility

Solar City车

- 太阳能电动汽车
- 6.6英尺长，顶部板有250瓦峰值功率
- 在CES展示的原型售价6250美元

OrCam Technologies

OrCam Hear

- 针对听力受损的人群的“鸡尾酒会难题”
- 由耳塞和人工智能应用程序组成的系统
- 创建扬声器配置文件以隔离嘈杂环境中的声音

EcoFlow

Delta Pro Ultra

- 太阳能备用电池发电机
- 重量为186磅的便携设备
- 可编程在能源高峰时期接管能源供应

Withings

BeamO

- 四合一设备，结合了体温计、心电图、数字听诊器和血氧监测仪
- 有潜力用于远程医疗
- 等待FDA审查，售价249.95美元
